content: At the entrance to this temple, you can now use the Snow Fox Brush in your inventory to transform into The Fox, and step inside to trigger a cutscene (if you enter first you can speak to him, but transforming near the monk will instantly trigger the fight without a scene).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-Void.md', within the main section titled 'Non-Void', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Non-Void'.
The content is as follows:
At the entrance to this temple, you can now use the Snow Fox Brush in your inventory to transform into The Fox, and step inside to trigger a cutscene (if you enter first you can speak to him, but transforming near the monk will instantly trigger the fight without a scene).
